item.description:
更好用 👰：

  1. 底层细调 3 种字体渲染逻辑，Times New Roman、Helvetica Neue、JetBrains Mono，换一种风格
  3. 导出格式支持 Html，同时优化 PDF、Image 导出效果
  5. 脑图可单独设置高度，此外 PPT 模式中也支持 MarkMap 脑图了
  7. 格式化更加好用无感并记住位置，一种很无感的格式化体验
  9. 对于大图预览场景可使用 img 标签 loading="lazy" 进行懒加载，渲染快不少
  11. 修复了极少机器底部回车闪动问题、重启场景增加二次确认、彻底解决蓝色划线、换行标题复制问题、序号回车优化、关闭文字拖拽、mermaid 增加更多特性、PPT下翻页位置优化、文档删除体验优化

Better use 👰：

  1. Fine tune 3 font rendering logics, Times New Roman, Helvetica Neue, JetBrains Mono, for a different style.
  3. Export format support for Html, with improved PDF and Image export effects.
  5. Markmap height can be set individually, and Markmap are now supported in PPT mode.
  7. Formatting is even better with no sensation and remembering the position, a very senseless formatting experience.
  9. For large preview scenes you can use the img tag loading="lazy" for lazy loading, which renders much faster
  11. Fixing the carriage return flicker at the bottom of very few machines, adding a second confirmation for restart scenes, completely solving the blue underline, duplication of line feed titles, optimizing the carriage return, turning off text dragging, adding more features to mermaid, optimizing the position of PPT page turns, document deletion experience optimization.

聪明点 🤩：

🎉 真正意义上的支持自动格式化排版，使用 Swift 调用 Prettier，聪明多了
🎊 macOS Ventura 全面兼容完成、排序功能更加好用、标题支持'/'形式、tab 宽度变成2
🙊 修复快速扫动出现划线、格式化时候光标位置、代码块之间标题高亮、预览模式下代码显示、自动外观模式下切换预览不会跟着变化、预览效果优化、列表 todoList 展示缩进等问题，感谢 shell-Raining、 jievince、熏锅锅帮忙捉虫

Much smarter 🤩：

🎉 Real support for auto-formatted typesetting, using Swift to call Prettier, much smarter.
🎊 macOS Ventura is fully compatible with completion, sorting ability is better, title support '/', tab width becomes 2.
🙊 Fix problems such as underlining in quick sweep, cursor position when formatting, highlighting of titles between code blocks, code display in preview mode, preview not changing when switching between automatic appearance modes, preview effect optimization, indentation of list todoList display, etc. Thanks to shell-Raining、jievince、熏锅锅 to help catch bugs.
